name: TerraForma
description: Improved design for PlanetMinecraft with many customization options. ［>］PlanetMinecraft blog: https://www.planetminecraft.com/blog/terraforma/ All options marked [WIP] is Work-In-Progress and currently work unstable!!

user.name: 1280-LEGACY
user.about: Collection of my odler styles I don't maintain anymore. Check My UsW for new styles!

additional_info: [ 02.04.2021 ] Update v0.81 -- PLANETMINECRAFT RELEASE -- Interface-based customization is now enabled (theme chooser and seasonal features are currently broken for some reason) -- Added "Hide Popular Reel" option -- "Legacy Content Width" option fix -- Added UserStyles link to CSS -- "Updated Assets" resource update [ 01.04.2021 ] Update v0.79 -- FIRST PUBLIC RELEASE -- Chat support -- Forum top navbuttons support -- Added "Legacy Content Width" option -- "Updated Assets" resource update -- Small fixes and code cleanup
